name: Schedule Trigger
semantic_context: Triggers the workflow on a given schedule
natural_language_description: 这是 Schedule Trigger 节点。主要用于: Triggers the workflow on a given schedule

notice.displayName:
This workflow will run on the schedule you define here once you publish it.

For testing, you can also trigger it manually: by going back to the canvas and clicking 'execute workflow'
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description:
参数名: This workflow will run on the schedule you define here once you publish it.

For testing, you can also trigger it manually: by going back to the canvas and clicking 'execute workflow'

rule.name: rule
rule.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger Rules | 默认值: {'interval': [{'field': 'days'}]}
